func_before: function nt(e,t){var n=e.first;e:do{for(var r=0;r<e.children.length;++r){var i=e.children[r],o=i.height;if(t<o){e=i;continue e}t-=o,n+=i.chunkSize()}return n}while(!e.lines);for(var a=0;a<e.lines.length;++a){var s=e.lines[a].height;if(t<s)break;t-=s}return n+a}
